# hive-langchain

ðŸ¦œðŸ”— LangChain for Hive.

## Installation

### With PIP

```sh
pip install hive-langchain
```

### From source

```sh
git clone https://github.com/gbenson/hive.git
cd hive/libs/langchain
make setup
. .venv/bin/activate
make check
```
